channel.title: The Cow Scimatar V2 {Released}
channel.description:
Download file's in attatchments, your welcome :D. My most recent one I made because on version 1 I kept being told about what could be improved. I couldn't do everything but I feel satisfied with what I've done. Please feel free to critisize. Just be nice because it took 3 hours to make and I'm not making v3. V2 is just me redoing v1 but with more presise detail. My V1 WireFrame and outline were sloppy, I hope I've made an improvment
[size=18pt][u][i][b]Comparison:[/b][/i][/u][/size] [IMG]http://i562.photobucket.com/albums/ss67/killernoob3/TheCowSword2-1.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i562.photobucket.com/albums/ss67/killernoob3/MySword.jpg[/img]
[size=18pt][u][i][b]VERSION 2:[/b][/i][/u][/size] Based off the pic: [IMG]http://i562.photobucket.com/albums/ss67/killernoob3/KR0038A.jpg[/img]
This is what I made... [IMG]http://i562.photobucket.com/albums/ss67/killernoob3/TheCowSword2-1.jpg[/img]
Outline before WireFrame... [IMG]http://i562.photobucket.com/albums/ss67/killernoob3/TheCowScimatar2Outline.jpg[/img]
WireFrame... [IMG]http://i562.photobucket.com/albums/ss67/killernoob3/TheCowScimatar2WireFrame.jpg[/img]
Wielded Picture... [IMG]http://i562.photobucket.com/albums/ss67/killernoob3/TheCowSword2Wielded.jpg[/img]
[size=18pt][i][u][b]VERSION 1:[/b][/u][/i][/size] This is what I made... [IMG]http://i562.photobucket.com/albums/ss67/killernoob3/MySword.jpg[/img]
WireFrame Image... [IMG]http://i562.photobucket.com/albums/ss67/killernoob3/TheCowSwordWire.jpg[/img]
Here's a pic of it wielded... [IMG]http://i562.photobucket.com/albums/ss67/killernoob3/MySword2.jpg[/img]

[quote=“str pk3, post:7, topic:349242”]release release release come on dude this is like a cool model can u make a v3 so it appears like a 2h sword, it would be cool i would call it in my source

cow godsword haha[/quote]
Ya I suppose I could add a 2h Version, and ya ill release as soon as I get to my other pc
